name: Imagine-Blocks
description:
A sandbox game where you collect stuff and kill monsters

controls:

wasd: move - left click: pick up and move things/ use or craft things - 0: creative mode (to deactivate it you must restart the game so make sure to not accidently press it)

UPDATE LOG

version 1: trees, hills, slugs, slimes, stone armor, stone sword, stone pickaxe, crafting table, and Spinning Slug boss.
